radiographic_examinations.findings: enlarged cardiac silhouette and clear lungs
patches of mild T2 hyperintensity in the white matter of the centrum semiovale indicating increased water content; no signs of restricted diffusion to suggest ischemia.
nodular liver with heterogeneous architecture, severe ascites, and decreased signal intensity within the liver and pancreas
nodular liver with heterogeneous architecture, severe ascites, decreased signal intensity within liver and pancreas; normal signal in the spleen. Presence of abnormal vasculature within the liver.
mild right ventricular dilation, right ventricular hypertrophy

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI showing diffuse nodularity of the liver
radiographic_examinations.findings: consistent with cirrhosis; enlarged left lobe of the liver, atrophied right lobe.
lobular disarray with prominent bands of fibrosis; early regenerative nodules suggestive of progression to early cirrhosis.
